trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IPersistFile?displayProperty=fullName> instead.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IPersistFile?displayProperty=fullName>相反。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile` and `IPersist` in the com subfolder of the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersistFile`和`IPersist`MSDN 库的 com 子文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the class identifier (CLSID) of an object.
trans-unit.target: 检索对象的类标识符 (CLSID)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersist::GetClassID` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersist::GetClassID`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: On successful return, a reference to the CLSID.
trans-unit.target: 在成功返回时，对 CLSID 的引用。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves either the absolute path to current working file of the object, or if there is no current working file, the default filename prompt of the object.
trans-unit.target: 检索当前工作文件的对象，任一的绝对路径，或者如果没有任何当前的工作文件，该对象的默认文件名提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::GetCurFile` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersistFile::GetCurFile`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The address of a pointer to a zero-terminated string containing the path for the current file, or the default filename prompt (such as *.txt).
trans-unit.target: 包含当前文件或默认的文件名提示 （例如 *.txt) 的路径以零结尾的字符串的指针地址。

trans-unit.source: Checks an object for changes since it was last saved to its current file.
trans-unit.target: 检查对象的更改，因为自上次保存到其当前文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::IsDirty` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersistFile::IsDirty`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_OK" name="S_OK" href=""></xref> if the file has changed since it was last saved; <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_FALSE" name="S_FALSE" href=""></xref> if the file has not changed since it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_S_OK" name="S_OK" href=""></xref>如果文件已更改自上次，保存;<xref uid="langword_csharp_S_FALSE" name="S_FALSE" href=""> </xref>如果自上次保存后未更改该文件。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified file and initializes an object from the file contents.
trans-unit.target: 打开指定的文件并初始化的对象，该文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: The `STGM` enumeration is not part of the .NET Framework, but is documented in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: `STGM`枚举不属于.NET Framework 中，但记录在 MSDN 库。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Load` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersistFile::Load`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to open.
trans-unit.target: 以零结尾的字符串，其中包含要打开的文件的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A combination of values from the <xref uid="langword_csharp_STGM" name="STGM" href=""></xref> enumeration to indicate the access mode in which to open `pszFileName`.
trans-unit.target: 从值的组合<xref uid="langword_csharp_STGM" name="STGM" href=""></xref>枚举，以指示要在其中打开访问模式`pszFileName`。

trans-unit.source: Saves a copy of the object into the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 将对象的副本保存到指定的文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::Save` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersistFile::Save`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: A zero-terminated string containing the absolute path of the file to which the object is saved.
trans-unit.target: 以零结尾的字符串，其中包含该对象保存到文件的绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether `pszFileName` is to be used as the current working file.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否`pszFileName`是要用作当前的工作文件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the object that it can write to its file.
trans-unit.target: 通知的对象，它可以写入其文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, please see the existing documentation for `IPersistFile::SaveCompleted` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅针对现有的文档`IPersistFile::SaveCompleted`MSDN 库中。

trans-unit.source: The absolute path of the file where the object was previously saved.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的对象的文件的绝对路径。
